    Color Scale Class

    ColorScale.Rd

    Maps data values to colors

    Super class

    AdvancedGgplot::Scale -> ColorScale

    Methods

    Public methods

    • ColorScale$new()

    • ColorScale$transform()

    • ColorScale$clone()

    Inherited methods
    • AdvancedGgplot::Scale$render_axis()

    Method new()

    Initialize color scale

    Usage

    ColorScale$new(aesthetic, palette, na_color = "#808080")

    Arguments

    aesthetic

    The aesthetic to scale

    palette

    Color palette to use

    na_color

    Color for NA values

    Method transform()

    Transform data values to colors

    Usage

    ColorScale$transform(x)

    Arguments

    x

    Values to transform

    Method clone()

    The objects of this class are cloneable with this method.

    Usage

    ColorScale$clone(deep = FALSE)

    Arguments

    deep

    Whether to make a deep clone.
